feed.title: Eleano Barone Portfolio
feed.subtitle: Hello! My name is Eleano Barone, I'm majoring in Software Engineering and Economics at Allegheny College. I am fascinated on how code can shape the future and make everyday tasks easier. This is exactly what I want to do, and I am excited to dive deeper into both fields. Being fluent in Italian and English also helps me see things from different perspectives, and I am always looking forward to learning from and working with others who share my passion. I am confident that this path is where I am meant to be, and I cannot wait to take on challenges along the way!.

entry.title: Swim Instructor
entry.content:
Expierence

During the summers I am a Red Cross Certified Swimming Instructor. I successfully teach children ages 3-15 how to swim, and teach them about water safety.

entry.title: Food Management
entry.content:
Expierence

I am currently a Manager at my family’s resturaunt, Pizza Town. My tasks are to ensure employees, and customers are happy. On the job, you can catch me filling in whenever a cook needs a break, helping with payroll, checking inventory, and ordering inventory. I also help run our social media pages.
entry.summary: Expierence I am currently a Manager at my family’s resturaunt, Pizza Town. My tasks are to ensure employees, and customers are happy. On the job, you can catch me filling in whenever a cook needs a break, helping with payroll, checking inventory, and ordering inventory. I also help run our social media pages.

entry.title: Lifeguard
entry.content:
Expierence

During the Summer I am a Lifeguard and work at the local community pool to give back to the community that has served me. —
